label: No ghost nodes between 125
reason: Mathematical consequence of G18 (Mass-Gap Quantization). The spectral gap Delta_m >= 1/288 is the same theorem restated - discrete eigenvalue spectrum with gaps > 0 is guaranteed by G18's theorem.
note: MATHEMATICAL: No ghost nodes between 125. This is a mathematical constraint derivable from the 288-root manifold. v22: Spectral gap = 1/288 = 1/(4*chi_eff) where chi_eff=72.
